questions.quote: The Chinese have done it my friend. The Chinese have done it.
I can't believe I lost the deposit on that U-Haul. And I threw out my couch.
Oh, I can't begin to tell you how much I hate that commercial.
Oh, Mrs Hamilton, this is a very bad time. I've got Valerie on the other line. Just a second.
No, I don't believe in it. I'm taking a stand against all this over thanking.
Okay. But if I'm going to do this, we play by my rules or we don't play at all.
Kramer, Jerry is going to be here any second, and then this line is going to start moving, and we're going to end up in the front row.
Come on up.  Oh, all right, forget it, I'm gonna take it with me now...  I'm just gonna pack up the cushions right now...
Yeah, I already did it. It won't come off. The zipper's suck..
For putting my picture up on that wall! I'm like Richard Dawson down there now. And every person I see engages me in this long, boring, tedious, conversation. I can't even get out of the building!
